questions: There are   _   elephants in the zoo .
article:
There are also two big elephants and a baby. Children like to ride on one of them. The elephants are very kind and friendly. They eat much grass and bananas.
In the zoo, we can see different kinds of bears, brown bears, black bears and white bears. They are all slow and clumsy  . They stand on their back legs and lift   their front legs to ask for food . They like cakes very much.
Do you like pandas? There's only one in the zoo . Her name is LIngling. She is very cute. She likes eating bamboo  a lot . She is kind of shy. She's very interesting.
